DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Teen Outreach Program Hennepin County , Minnesota
DOC.detailed_description: This cluster randomize control trial . Teachers randomize within school treatment control condition . To assess impact offering TOP速 , student survey three time : baseline , intervention begin treatment group ; 12 month baseline ( short-term impact ) ; 24 month baseline ( long-term impact ) . Baseline data subsequent follow-up data collect use Web-based survey . Paper survey use back-up baseline data collection . The pooled survey data two school-year cohort ( school year 2011-2012 2012-2013 ) used estimate program impact use intent-to-treat ( ITT ) analysis . Program fidelity interview data use describe program implementation.TOP速 deliver middle school , high school , alternative school , public charter school Hennepin County . It implement school hour class span entire school year cohort student . The subject class TOP速 place differ across school ( example , social study , study hall , health ) .
